article_title: Small Businesses Can Tap Their Customer Access
article_text:
Jane Park, Founder and Chief Executive Officer, Julep Beauty Inc.:

"As the CEO of a startup, I wear dozens of hats and face many different challenges every day. One of the biggest challenges I grapple with is how to make the space for true innovation to flourish. We're so busy building the car as we zoom down the highway that...

twitter.description: Jane Park on learning from your clients
twitter.title: The Small-Business Advantage: Customer Access

image.alt: Small firms have a huge asset: access to customers. Here's how to leverage it.
